attributes.action: MAKE SCHOOLS ABOUT LEARNING, NOT PASSING EXAMS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having recently sat an A level in Spanish at night school, all that is being taught in schools and colleges appears to be how to pass exams, and not how to speak, for example, a language.  Can we have subjects taught so that they are actually of benefit in the "real world"?
